means: （希腊神话中）三个蛇发女怪之一（能让人化为石头）
可怕的女人，令人生厌的女人
<希神> 蛇发女怪，可怕的女人，丑妇

sentence.Network_en: They would not be devoured by this gorgon of the East.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不愿被这个东部的妖怪吃掉.

sentence.Network_en: The Gorgon, Miss Springer, the games mistress came back to gave me a raspberry.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个女妖魔, 即体育教师斯普林杰小姐又回来把我教训一通.

sentence.Network_en: Perseus , favored by Minerva and Mercury, set out against the Gorgon.
sentence.Network_cn: 珀尔修斯在密涅瓦和墨丘利的庇护下出发去征服这蛇发女妖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: via Latin from Greek Gorgō, from gorgos 'terrible'

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) any of three winged sister monsters and the mortal Medusa who had live snakes for hair; a glance at Medusa turned the beholder to stone
